column2: The private detective joined him at 11:34 a.m., only minutes after the Paddington express had pulled into Temple Meads station. Mitchell slipped into the chair opposite his only client, although he hadnâ€™t received any remuneration for several months.

Christmas Eve 1995. 11.34 am. The first time, Almasa says it slowly and softly, as if she is really looking for an answer, "Are you talking to me?" She peers into the small, grimy mirror in a train toilet.
column3: How to Fare Well and Stay Fair
